contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox ice hockey player | image = | image_size = | position = [[Centre (ice hockey)|Centre]] | shoots = Left | height_ft = 5 | height_in = 6 | weight_lb = 180 | played_for = [[HC Lada Togliatti]]<br>[[Kazzinc-Torpedo|Torpedo Ust-Kamenogorsk]]<br>[[Metallurg Magnitogorsk]]<br>[[HC Sibir Novosibirsk|Sibir Novosibirsk]]<br>[[Severstal Cherepovets]]<br>[[Mechel Chelyabinsk]]<br>[[HC Martigny]] | ntl_team = KAZ | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1970|3|11|mf=y}} | birth_place = [[Oskemen|Ust Kamenogorsk]], [[Soviet Union]] | draft = | draft_year = | draft_team = | career_start = 1991 | career_end = 2007 }} {{MedalTableTop}} {{MedalSport | Men's [[ice hockey]]}} {{MedalCountry | {{KAZ}} }} {{MedalCompetition|[[Asian Games]]}} {{MedalSilver | [[2007 Asian Winter Games|2007 Changchun]]|[[Ice hockey at the 2007 Asian Winter Games|Ice hockey]]}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Yevgeniy Koreshkov''' (born March 11, 1970 in [[Oskemen|Ust Kamenogorsk]], [[Soviet Union]]) is a Kazakhstani former [[ice hockey]] player of [[Russians|Russian]] descent and a Russian ice hockey coach.<ref>{{cite web|title=Коренная семья из У-Ка|url=http://www.kazzinc-torpedo.kz/show/2005-228.html|accessdate=2011-05-09|date=2005-10-12|publisher=[[Kazzinc-Torpedo]] Website}}</ref> He is an young brother of [[Alexander Koreshkov (ice hockey)|Alexander Koreshkov]]. Koreshkov played in Russia for [[HC Lada Togliatti]], [[Kazzinc-Torpedo|Torpedo Ust-Kamenogorsk]], [[Metallurg Magnitogorsk]], [[HC Sibir Novosibirsk|Sibir Novosibirsk]], [[Severstal Cherepovets]] and [[Mechel Chelyabinsk]].<ref name=eurohockey /> He also played for the [[Kazakhstani national ice hockey team|Kazakhstan]] in the [[1998 Winter Olympics|1998]]<ref name=98oly>{{cite web|title=Kazakhstan Team Stats Through Thursday February 12|url=http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/olympics/events/1998/nagano/stats/1998/stats.hockey.menkaz.html|accessdate=2010-01-28|date=1998-02-12|publisher=CNNSI.com}}</ref> and [[2006 Winter Olympics]].<ref name=06oly>{{cite web|title=2006 Olympic Men's Hockey Rosters|url=http://sports.espn.go.com/oly/winter06/hockey/news/story?id=2270142|accessdate=2010-01-28|date=2005-12-23|publisher=[[The Associated Press]]}}</ref> In the 2006 tournament, he scored 5 goals in 5 games before Kazakhstan were eliminated in the preliminary round of the tournament.<ref name=eurohockey>{{cite web|title=Evgeny Koreskhkov - player profile|url=http://www.eurohockey.net/players/show_player.cgi?serial=1843|accessdate=2010-01-28|publisher=EuroHockey.net}}</ref> He also holds [[Russia]]n citizenship.<ref>{{cite web|title=В олимпийской заявке Казахстана оказались 14 российских хоккеистов|url=http://www.newsru.com/arch/sport/22dec2005/kazahi.html|accessdate=2011-05-09|date=2005-12-22|publisher=NEWSru.com}}</ref> Yevgeniy Koreshkov is currently employed as the [[head coach]] of [[Minor Hockey League|MHL]]' [[Stalnye Lisy]].<ref>{{cite web|title=Состав команды Стальные Лисы|url=http://metallurg.ru/site/team/list-team/steelfoxes/|accessdate=2011-05-09|date=|publisher=[[Metallurg Magnitogorsk]] Website}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{hockeydb|54918}} *{{eurohockey|1843}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Koreshkov, Yevgeniy | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Kazakhstani ice hockey player | DATE OF BIRTH = March 11, 1970 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Ust Kamenogorsk]], [[Soviet Union]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Koreshkov, Yevgeniy}} [[Category:1970 births]] [[Category:Expatriate ice hockey players in Russia]] [[Category:HC Lada Togliatti players]] [[Category:HC Metallurg Magnitogorsk players]] [[Category:HC Mechel players]] [[Category:Severstal Cherepovets players]] [[Category:HC Sibir Novosibirsk players]] [[Category:Ice hockey players at the 1998 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Ice hockey players at the 2006 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Kazakhstani ice hockey players]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Kazakhstan]] [[Category:People from Oskemen]] [[Category:Kazakhstani people of Russian descent]] [[Category:Russian ice hockey coaches]] {{Kazakhstan-icehockey-bio-stub}}
